mapper.sql: a.id, a.name, a.fund, a.is_activate AS 'isActivate', a.total, a.type, a.start_time AS 'startTime', a.end_time AS 'endTime', (SELECT COUNT(cs.id) FROM ec_coupon_shop AS cs WHERE coupon_id=a.id) AS "couponUsedCount"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM ec_coupon a WHERE a.del_flag = 0
AND a.start_time > STR_TO_DATE(#{sqlMap.st},"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s")
AND STR_TO_DATE(#{sqlMap.et},"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") > a.end_time
ORDER BY a.is_activate ASC ,a.end_time ASC

SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(1) > 0 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END FROM ec_coupon coupon WHERE coupon.id NOT IN (#{id}) AND coupon.type = #{type} AND coupon.is_activate = #{ACTIVATED} AND coupon.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND ( (coupon.end_time > STR_TO_DATE(#{startTime},"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") AND STR_TO_DATE(#{startTime},"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") > coupon.start_time) OR (coupon.end_time > STR_TO_DATE(#{endTime},"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") AND STR_TO_DATE(#{endTime},"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") > coupon.start_time) OR (STR_TO_DATE(#{endTime},"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") > coupon.start_time AND coupon.start_time > STR_TO_DATE(#{startTime},"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s")) OR (STR_TO_DATE(#{endTime},"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") > coupon.end_time AND coupon.end_time > STR_TO_DATE(#{startTime},"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s")) )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ec_coupon( id, name, fund, total, type, start_time, end_time, is_activate, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{fund}, #{total}, #{type}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{NOT_ACTIVATED}, #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ec_coupon SET name = #{name}, fund = #{fund}, total = #{total}, type = #{type}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT shop.name AS "name", count(1) AS "y" FROM ec_coupon_oper_log log LEFT JOIN ec_coupon i ON i.id = log.coupon_id LEFT JOIN ec_coupon_fund fund ON log.coupon_fund_id = fund.id LEFT JOIN ec_shop shop ON shop.id = fund.shop_id WHERE i.id = #{id} GROUP BY shop.id
